featured_prop.Directions: Bob Hope to Clancy Lane to The Renaissance gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Private gated estate on 1.31 acres in the heart of Rancho Mirage! Five bedrooms, seven and a half baths including guest casita. Featuring great room with grand two way fireplace with formal dining on the other side and sit down wet bar with patio access. Absolutely charming gourmet kitchen with beautiful wood and glass cabinets, extended island / counter bar, and top of the line appliances. Family room is adjacent with breakfast nook and wine cellar. Elegant master suite with fireplace, sitting area, inviting marble bath and custom closet. Guest casita has living area and wet bar. Pocket doors open to wonderful outdoor living area with resort like pool and raised spa. Outdoor bar with BBQ kitchen, and open cabana with fireplace overlooks the pool. All this and panoramic mountain views make this a Desert paradise! Offered furnished per inventory! Available for Lease.
featured_prop.Rooms: Dining Room,Family Room,Great Room,Guest Room,Wine Cellar

featured_prop.Directions: Bob Hope to Clancy Lane
featured_prop.Remarks: Magnificent estate compound with over three acres of park like grounds on prestigious Clancy Lane! Six bedrooms, seven and a half baths including guest wing and guest house. Approx. 10,495 sq. ft. Features elegant stone entry bridge over water, living room with marble two sided fireplace to dining room and custom marble sit down wet bar. Gourmet kitchen with center prep/cook island and family room with fireplace, media and breakfast nook. The guest wing has a living room with fireplace, full kitchen and laundry. Guest house has game room and wet bar. Master suite is fit for a king with marble fireplace, media and his and her baths. Resort like pool with large spa, waterfalls and swim up bar. Three hole putting green, sunken tennis court with lights and seating terrace. Every amenity and sensational mountain views! Available for lease, call listing agent for more information.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Incredible South Facing contemporary! Award winning home by renowned architect Vassos Demetriou. 4 BR, 4.5 BA approx. 6,000 sq. ft. on .48 acre lot. Features impressive foyer entry to great room with fireplace and entertainment center. Formal dining room and gourmet kitchen with center island/bar and stainless appliances including the ultimate wine cooler. Master retreat with fireplace, sitting area and exquisite bath. Finest materials including walls of stone and Venetian plaster. This is a smart house that can be controlled from a central location and wall mounted displays. Wonderful indoor/outdoor living including loggia with dining and extended patio with B.B.Q. center and bar. Custom fire pit with seating area. Large custom pool with pass over bridge, raised spa and water features. All this plus fabulous south facing mountain views and waterfalls located on the 9th fairway of the Pete Dye course.

featured_prop.Directions: Hwy 111 to Jefferson (south) to Hideaway gate
featured_prop.Remarks: Beautiful custom Spanish style estate at Hideaway Golf Club! Four bedrooms, four and a half baths including casita. Approx. 4,269 sq. ft. on .32 acre lot. Features great room with fireplace, built-in media and bar. Formal dining room, one of a kind gourmet kitchen with center island, counter bar, top of the line appliances and breakfast nook. Master suite with fireplace, wet bar, sitting area and spa inspired bath with his and her closets. Pocket doors open to loggia with media. Custom pool with waterfalls and raised spa. Fire pit, BBQ and incredible double lake, mountain and fairway views on the 17th of the Pete Dye course!

featured_prop.DiningRoomDesc: Breakfast,Breakfast Nook,Breakfast Room,Breakfast/Bar,Dining Area,Eat In Kitchen,Kitchen Island
featured_prop.Directions: Enter at front gate on Fred Waring. Turn right on Parkway Esplande S, Left on Bordeaux, Right on Calle Espada, right on Corte Nuevo. House at end of cul-de-sac.

featured_prop.Remarks: Book now for October, November to December 15 or April 2017. Property is being remodeled with new custom kitchen, flooring & new great room furnishings. Live your dream in this newly designed lush landscaped south west lot with new private salt water 40 foot pool/9 foot tanning ledge/spa for 8/water feature/huge BBQ & rectangle fire pit. Large 5 bedroom & 4 bath home which could accommodate 10 guests with 2 Kings,2 Queens. 5th bedroom is an den/office with sofa. 7 flat screen TV including TVs in each bedroom/den, great room and kitchen. The 3356 square foot home features an open flowing floor plan with large gourmet kitchen with eating area, new stainless 2 drawer dishwasher, Wolf cooktop & hood plus new huge stainless refrigerator. Enjoy the dining room, cozy fireplace plus 5 sets of french doors leading to this amazing professional landscaped yard with complete privacy including a walking/biking path. Book early so you don't miss out on this fantastic setting.

featured_prop.Directions: As you enter Tradition, make a rt on Deacon Drive, another rt on Del Gato. Left on Claret Cove, left on Talking Rock Turn.
featured_prop.Remarks: This stunning south facing sprawling custom home is resplendent with light featuring 3 bedrooms, 3.5 baths plus a separate office, approx. 4790 sq ft sitting on the 14th fairway hole on a quiet interior location with the most spectacular mountain views in Tradition on one of the most sought after streets. The home allows for perfect formal and casual entertaining areas enhanced with soaring dramatic angled cedar ceilings in the dining room, office and living room. Enjoy outdoor living by the lagoon shaped resort style pool/spa with a cascading rock waterfall looking out to the incredible mountain backdrop on an estate size lot. Amenities include travertine stone floors, gourmet granite island kitchen w/stainless appliances, marble bathrooms and more. This is a wow factor home not to be missed. Offered furnished per inventory.

featured_prop.Directions: Main Gate all the way to back gate. Turn right on Gold Canyon.
featured_prop.Remarks: LEASED FOR 2016-2017 Season (Jan-April 2017). Over the top POOL/SPA home! Large fenced yard allows for great sun on pool! Updated and Contemporary flair with timeless taste! Located high above Arroyo # 9, the lake and mountain views are stunning! New, New, New. Pavered entry/driveway, desertscaping & outdoor lighting...kitchen cabinet fronts and pull out drawers, high-end stainless steel appliances, stacked stone backsplash, tile flooring, stone fireplace...ALL new furniture, toilets, faucets, framed bath mirrors. The upgrades are amazing! The window coverings are Silhouettes & there are crisp shutters in the bedrooms. The hall armoire is built-in for great storage. The walk-in closet in master has been custom fit so there is no unused space! You'll find gorgeous updated lighting with dimmers throughout. This is the popular great room floor plan with great separation of bedrooms and the large great room with built-in bar, kitchen, dining and living space in one.

featured_prop.Directions: South on Madison Street turn into Greg Norman gate. House is on right hand side.
featured_prop.Remarks: The Most Spectacular Views! Lake, Southern Mountain and Greg Norman golf course views make this location so special and private. Enjoy desert living in this Santa Rosa Plan featuring approx. 3,800 sq ft, 3bdrms, 3.5baths, plus den and an office providing the perfect set up for entertaining with a true chef's granite island kitchen w/breakfast nook, family room off kitchen, granite wet bar, Travertine floors, master suite w/ marble bath with gorgeous views, and more. Resort backyard perfect for entertaining with pool/spa and built-in BBQ, firepit and estate size lot. Enjoy sun all day long by the dramatic infinity salt water pool/spa with forever views.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter Legends gate from Madison. Past gate, turn left to Golf View Drive. Home on right hand side.
featured_prop.Remarks: Extraordinary Entertainer's Dream Home! Beautifully situated on a premier south facing location on the 12th hole of the Jack Nicklaus Tournament with panoramic coveted Santa Rosa Mountain views! This desert resort home features approx 2818 sq ft, 4bdrms, 4.5 baths including a private detached casita with many amenities including professional chef's kitchen upgrades with stainless Wolf range & double oven, Sub Zero refrigerator & Bosch dishwasher, upgraded cabinets in cherry wood, apron front sink & custom hood in kitchen, built-ins throughout, travertine flooring, granite enhanced master bath, and more. This great room floorplan with walls of glass provides the perfect synergy of indoor/outdoor living space. Enjoy the veranda covered outdoor patio allowing lots of room for entertaining. The sparkling pebble tec salt water pool/spa enhances a spectacular courtyard entry providing privacy for outside entertaining by the pool.

featured_prop.Directions: Jefferson to PGA Blvd enter through the Weiskopf gate, home is on the right.
featured_prop.Remarks: Stunning mountain views at this PGA beauty! Enjoy this amazing golf course home with panoramic and multiple fairway views! Located on the private Weiskopf course, this south facing PGA beauty offers three bedrooms, three baths, nice open and floorplan! Enjoy the lush courtyard with fireplace perfect for relaxing with your evening cocktail, beautiful infinity pool & spa that overlooks the gorgeous Santa Rosa Mountains! Also, offered long term at $4800

featured_prop.Directions: Main gate down Indian Ridge Drive to Mesa Grande...Go Right, will be on your right.
featured_prop.MiscString4: Mountain View,Pool View,Golf Course View,Lake View
featured_prop.Remarks: AVAILABLE for 2016-2017 Season (4-month minimum). Casa Palmeras ~ Stunning elevated views over the lake on Arroyo # 2. This is your perfect winter home within the prestigious guard gated Indian Ridge Country Club. Fantastic Bougainvillea 1 model with PRIVATE POOL/SPA. Large great room with ceramic tile and great built-ins. Seating at wet bar and at long kitchen counter. Great floorplan for entertaining. All three bedrooms feature their own private bath. Master bedroom looks over fairway and lake. Wireless internet and TVs in bedrooms...this home is well appointed. Sleeps six. Small dog considered. Owner has IRCC Club Membership...Seasonal membership options are available for tenant.
featured_prop.ViewDescription: Golf Course View,Lake View,Mountain View,Pool View

featured_prop.Directions: From main gate on Country Club, turn left on Red Arrow after guard and go to almost the end of Red Arrow Trail.
featured_prop.Remarks: Leased January - March 2017. Tenant may use the owners country club membership and update to golf! SOUTH facing with views of the golf course, green, lakes, streams and spectacular mountain views. Spacious 3102 square foot home with good separation of bedrooms for maximum privacy. 3 sleeping bedrooms with a king in master and queens in 2 guest bedrooms all with private full baths. Large gourmet kitchen with large center island that opens to the family room with golf course views. Wet bar and dining room are adjoining the living room with double sliders that open the the golf course patio with custom BBQ area and fire pit. Enjoy some of the best south facing views on the 6th hole of the Grove course. Conveniently located close to a community pool and spa on a quiet interior street. Indian Ridge can upgrade the club membership to golf. Centrally located close to all dining and shopping on El Paseo.

featured_prop.Directions: Indian Ridge main gate to Tomahawk Drive. Turn right on Tomahawk, turn left on Mesa Grande Drive...home will be on your right.
featured_prop.Remarks: LEASED for the 2016-2017 Season! Casa Mesa Grande! High above Grove #16! Professionally decorated Bougainvillea 2 Spa home with fantastic views! East and south views! The outdoor entertaining yard is fenced, has an awning and a private SPA. Centrally located on an interior street, the courtyard is oversized and perfectly landscaped. Inside you'll find a sophisticated yet warm home with great attention to detail. Luxurious master has a king bed, the guest room has a queen bed, the office has a full pull-out. Club or Golf Membership is available - Call for details.

featured_prop.Remarks: Available November, December & January 2017. Fabulous luxury Tuscan lease at Indian Ridge Country Club. The newly landscaped courtyard with tiered fountain invites to you enter this special property. Enjoy the winter months with the west facing sun filled pool with cascading waterfall and spa and built-in BBQ with the golf course and San Jacinto mountains beyond. If you prefer shade there are 2 electronic awnings that can cover the patio & pool. The interior has custom wood trim, crown molding, paneling and built-ins throughout with travertine flooring with inlaid stone design. The master suite has a king bed & convenient office area. The 2 guest room suites - one is a king & the other guest suite has two full sized beds providing wonderful sleeping quarter for guests. The garage is air conditioned with epoxy floors & a golf cart is included. Please book early for this one of a kind luxury lease.

Fabulous south winter sun from a large private patio overlooking streams & lakes with mountain views. Enjoy private spa with rock water wall and dipping pool with custom BBQ area. Bougainvillea 1 open floor plan with 3 bedrooms & 3.5 baths with 2430 square feet. Master is a king & guest rooms are queens. No cost long distance calling to US and Canada with wireless internet included. Close to clubhouse activities & golf privileges are available to tenants.

featured_prop.Remarks: Leased February 13 to May 13 2017. Tenants can use owners sport club membership or upgrade to a golf membership with full privileges for the season. Rare west facing turnkey furnished bougainvillea 1 on the 16th hole of the Grove course. Popular great room floor plan with an open kitchen featuring views of the snow capped mountains & golf course. Large patio also two retractable awnings and the master bedroom is located on the fairway side of the property. Enjoy the large gourmet kitchen, separate wet bar. 3 bedrooms 3.5 baths with 2430 square feet of living space. Up-to-date 55 inch TV in great room & each bedroom has a 45 inch TV. Enjoy the Indian Ridge lifestyle at this rare seasonal rental. Master has king bed and the guest bedroom are queens. One bedroom has a desk area for a computer and workspace. Submit for small pets.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter Indian Ridge through main guard gate. Continue down Indian Ridge Drive. Turn left on Hawk Hill Trail. Take Hawk Hill to the left and continue to property on left hand side of street.
featured_prop.Remarks: Leased Jan - March 2017. Beautiful Bougainvillea 1 ready for seasonal lease. Tenant can upgrade owners social membership to club or golf membership as per club rules. Offered fully furnished and ready for the season. 3 bedroom 3.5 bath popular open floor plan with wet bar, large gourmet open kitchen, shutters and tile floors. Setup as 3 bedrooms - master with king, guest bedrooms queen and 2 twins plus office area. Located on a quiet interior street at prestigious Indian Ridge Country Club centrally located close to El Paseo shopping and gourmet restaurants.

featured_prop.Directions: Enter gate on Country Club Drive. After guard gate go straight on Indian Ridge Drive. Turn left on Hawk Hill. Turn right on Hawk Hill Trail. Property is on right side of street. No sign.
featured_prop.Remarks: Available for the 2017. Tenants can be approved to use owners sport club membership or upgrade to a golf membership with full privileges. West facing with south and west views from the 14th hole of the Arroyo course. Open floor plan with comfortable great room floor plan with formal dining, wet bar and double slider doors to the wide golf course patio with electronic awnings. New travertine flooring & 2 new flat screen TVs. Master with king bed, walk-in closets and luxurious master bath is adjacent to the golf course patio. Two guest suites and private baths are on opposite sides of the property for privacy. One with a twin bed with trundle to sleep 2 plus a desk area and the other with a queen bed This is a well appointed home that is immaculate.

featured_prop.Directions: Avenue 52 - Gate: Camino Modelo - cross Rancho Santa Drive onto Silver Star...home will be on the right.
featured_prop.Remarks: AVAILABLE for 2016-2017 Season! (3 month minimum - Available Nov. 2016 thru March 2017). Fun, private, pool/spa home with 4 bedrooms (sleeps 10)! You'll love this well done home, located across from the polo grounds in gated Rancho Santana! Rancho Santana has a big park with pergola & BBQ, a separate putting green area, and walking trails. The kitchen has granite and stainless appliances. Living room has a fireplace and flatscreen...with access to pool backyard and private interior courtyard with fire pit. Dining room has wet bar area and also has access to interior courtyard. Kitchen has table for 4 and also counter seating. Master sleeps 2, one guest room sleeps 4, another guest room sleeps 2...Front Casita sleeps 2 and has separate entrance.

featured_prop.Directions: Take Hwy 74 south to Homestead, go left. Immediatly turn left on Frontage. Go two streets and turn right on Skyward. Will be on your right hand side.
featured_prop.Remarks: AVAILABLE September thru November 2016! 2 month minimum. September $3,000, October $7,000, November $4,000. South Palm Desert home with SOUTH yard and pool! This great classic has been highly updated and retained the cool factor! Open great room features kitchen, living and dining...beautiful limestone floors and high ceilings with great light. 3 bedrooms with baths are very private. Granite counters in kitchen and baths. Stainless appliances in kitchen. Also there is a den for TV viewing/reading. The very private pool area gets great south sun, but also has a covered area for dining. Unlimited US/Canada phone/ high speed Internet and WIFI, Cable including HBO. NEW Misting System on back patio!

featured_prop.Directions: Go through front gate on Country Club Drive. After guard turn left on Red Arrow, turn left on Desert Holly Drive and right on Red Arrow Trail.

featured_prop.Remarks: Leased Jan 1 2017 - to April, 2017. Tenant can access owners club membership or upgrade to golf. Available as a SOUTH FACING seasonal lease. Remodeled from travertine flooring with crown molding, new kitchen with large granite center island, new stainless appliances, travertine bathrooms with new showers & counters, extended patio complete with electronic awnings. Property has a king in the master, queen and 2 twins. Conveniently located one building from a community pool and spa. Call for availability and off season rates. Indian Ridge is an upscale address close to El Paseo shopping, restaurants and close to golf venues. Make this your desert getaway. Landlord wants a minimum of 4 - 5 months. Will consider a discount for a 6 month seasonal lease.

featured_prop.Directions: From main gate on Country Club. Turns right on Hawk Hill Trail. Turn left on Arrowhead. Turn left onto Deer Haven Circle. Located 3rd property from the end of street across from the rarely used community pool and spa.

featured_prop.Remarks: Relax on the huge south facing patio with magnificent fairway, green, water & mountain views on the 4th grove course. The remodeled 3 bedroom 3.5 bath Smoke Tree 2 floor plan has extra square footage in the great room & guest suite creating 2932 square feet of luxury living. The rarely used sun filled pool and spa are mere steps away... so convenient & like having your own pool without the expense & maintenance. The family room, kitchen, dining and great room all have massive windows and slider doors which open to the patio & golf course to enjoy another day of south sun either from the expansive patio with retractable awning or relaxing at the convenient pool. Entertain in style with the flowing floor plan with 2 dining areas, gourmet kitchen with new stainless appliances, large en-suite bedrooms including powder bath. The luxurious master suite has separate walk-in closets and bath with spa tub & separate shower. Beds are 2 kings and a queen.
